document_data.name: ''Staff of Icy Touch''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''staff of icy touch''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[staff]] used in combat. It could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''staff of icy touch'' fired a ''[[ray of frost]]'', but had a good chance of spontaneously releasing two additional rays, each targeting a different enemy of the wielder.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Shevarith Kendia]], a [[rashemi]] wizard who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
